name: DEATHS MAZE
description:
Introduction

You were killed at work and that's not all, your soul is now trapped in Deaths maze. You need to escape Deaths Maze to go to heaven. you must find portals to advance to the next levels until you find your way out. Do not let Death catch you as your soul will be trapped for an eternity. Using a ghostly fire arm filled from mana and a glow stick that can travel walls will you be able to out smart deaths traps and minions and make it through the Gates of Heaven.

Featuring

Pick from 4 unique souls
Over 60 Hell maze style levels.
Dozens of enemy's and traps.
10 Complete themes
Character Upgrades and talent tree
Weekly and Daily quests
Seasonal themes
Bonus levels for extra loot
